dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: If you had to be alone on a deserted island for a day, what would you bring?
만약 하루동안 혼자 무인도에 있어야 한다면 어떤 것을 가져가고 싶으십니까?
Of course, I'd bring my phone, right?
I'd bring lots of food to eat! Ramen, chicken...
나는 먹을 것들을 잔뜩 챙길래요! 라면, 치킨...
I'd just take it easy~ I wouldn't bring anything!
이김에 쉬다 올래요~ 아무것도 안 챙길거예요!

dialogues.speaker: tiger
answer: Yes, with just a phone, we can do a lot
맞습니다. 핸드폰만 있어도 많은 것을 할 수 있지요!
Oh, imagining ramen on a deserted island... My mouth waters at the thought.
오 무인도에서 라면이라... 상상만 해도 군침이 흐르는 것 같습니다.
Oh, taking a rest on a deserted island sounds truly healing!
오 무인도에서 휴식을 취하는 것은 정말 힐링일 것 같습니다!

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: Ah, you're asking what I'd bring?

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: I think having Lucy would be enough for me! Haha!
저는 호순씨만 있으면 될 것 같습니다! 하하핫

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: I'll go for this for today!
